name: Node.js
notes: Node.js is required for running JavaScript on the backend and installing frontend dependencies.

name: npm
notes: npm is a package manager for Node.js.

name: yarn
notes: Yarn is an alternative package manager to npm.

name: Visual Studio Code (VS Code)
notes: VS Code is a lightweight, extensible code editor popular for frontend development.

name: Vue.js CLI
notes: Vue.js CLI is a standard tool for scaffolding and managing Vue.js projects.

name: React
notes: React is a popular library for building user interfaces.

name: Vite
notes: Vite is a fast build tool and development server for modern web projects, supporting frameworks like Vue and React.

name: Webpack
notes: Webpack is a module bundler for JavaScript and assets.

name: React Developer Tools
notes: React Developer Tools help debug React applications in the browser.

name: Chrome
notes: Google Chrome is a widely used browser with powerful developer tools.

name: Firefox Developer Edition
notes: Firefox Developer Edition is tailored for web developers.

name: Tailwind CSS CLI
notes: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.

name: PostCSS CLI
notes: PostCSS CLI processes styles with plugins for modern CSS.

name: TypeScript
notes: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing.

name: ESLint
notes: ESLint helps identify and fix problems in JavaScript code.

name: Prettier
notes: Prettier is a code formatter that enforces a consistent style.

name: SASS
notes: SASS is a preprocessor scripting language that compiles into CSS.

name: Figma
notes: Figma is a cloud-based design tool used for UI/UX design.

name: Storybook
notes: Storybook is a tool for developing UI components in isolation.

name: Browsersync
notes: Browsersync is a tool for live reloading during development.

name: Git
notes: Git is a version control system essential for collaboration.

name: GitHub CLI (gh)
notes: GitHub CLI provides a command-line interface for GitHub workflows.

name: ngrok
notes: ngrok exposes local development servers to the internet.

name: asciinema
notes: asciinema records and shares terminal sessions.

name: npm-check-updates
notes: npm-check-updates upgrades project dependencies to the latest versions.

name: nvm
notes: nvm is a version manager for Node.js, allowing you to install and switch between multiple versions of Node.js.
